sentences.sContent: The receding tide stranded the whale.
sentences.sCn: 退潮把鲸鱼搁浅在海滩上。

sentences.sContent: So whale come out fish, because they are fish obviously.
sentences.sContent_eng: So whale come out fish, because they are fish obviously.
sentences.sCn: 所以鲸鱼就是鱼，因为他们显然是鱼。

sentences.sContent: This sense of revelation is in part due to our changing attitude towards the whale.
sentences.sContent_eng: This sense of revelation is in part due to our changing attitude towards the whale.
sentences.sCn: 与鲸鱼感到关联部分是由于和我们对鲸鱼态度发生了变化。

phrases.pCn: [美国口语]了不起的，非常大的，极大的；极好的，精彩的
巨头鲸；抹香鲸（等于Physeter catodon）

trans.tranOther: a very large animal that lives in the sea and looks like a fish, but is actually a mammal
